Sponsors

Women’s Business Alliance

Development and operation of the Alliance platform is supported by the following Alliance company members and partners:
Progress
Progress Joint Stock Company is the baby food leader in Russia. The Company produces a big range of baby food products (250+ SKUs) under the FrutoNyanya brand. The Company’s production site in Lipetsk implements the top trending technologies in compliance with the Russian and international food safety and quality standards. Our capacities produce 2+ billion packs per year. The Company's products are distributed to all Russian regions and exported to 18 countries.
visit site
Global Rus Trade
The first Russian B2B platform of cross-border e-commerce. GRT is the leading online platform for Russian non-primary export products to the countries of BRICS, Southeast Asia and Latin America.We believe that e-commerce is the most effective and convenient way of developing one’s business. At our platform we strive to provide all the tools for finding new business partners in Russia and all over the world.
visit site
Velpharm
Velpharm LLC is a modern Russian fully integrated pharmaceutical manufacturer, created on the basis of the BRIGHT WAY GROUP pharmaceutical holding. Velpharm guarantees consumers the highest quality standard of manufactured drugs. Our top priority is the health and safety of our clients. The company is developing in the direction of increasing the bioavailability of drugs through the use of new excipients and the selection of optimal production technology.
visit site
Epotos
Group of companies EPOTOS is one of the main designers and producers of powder, aerosol, gas and water mist fire extinguishing in Russia, which has been operating in the Russian market of firefighting equipment for more than 25 years. Nowadays, Group of companies EPOTOS includes 12 enterprises located in various regions of Russia and abroad that produce more than 50 different types of automatic fire extinguishing means (such as powder, aerosol and water mist) as well as automatic fire detection and extinguishing systems ASOTP for trains of subways, railway, urban passenger transport, special transport, quarry and heavy construction equipment.
visit site
Orthomoda
Orthomoda is a Russian company specializing in the production of orthopedic shoes and clothing for people with disabilities. Founded in 2001 by Galina Volkova. It produces about 50-60 thousand pairs of shoes per year. It has a retail chain of stores. More than 50% of the company's employees are people with disabilities.
visit site
